section.title: Pineapple Upside-Down Cupcakes

para.emphasis: In my family, pineapple upside down cake was always the big treat. Nowadays, I've seen pineapple upside down cupcakes and they are really cool. So, here's a pineapple upside down cupcake recipe.

section.para: This recipe will make a batch of 6 jumbo size muffin cakesâ€”you need to use jumbo muffin tins in order to use a whole pineapple ring.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray your muffin tins with non-stick cooking spray.
Sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt. In a separate bowl, beat together eggs, white sugar, and pineapple juice for 2 minutes. Add to the wet ingredients and beat for 2 minutes.

In a small sauce pan, melt the butter and add the brown sugar. Stir on low heat for one minute. Spoon a layer of the warm brown sugar mixture into the bottom of each muffin tin, then put a pineapple ring and cherry on top. Pour cake mixture over to fill muffin tin 3/4 of the way full.
Bake for 25 minutes. The cake is done with a toothpick inserted in the middle comes out clean.
